alert.note: Alert for Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 8:37AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Portions of the Nebraska Panhandle and southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, in panhandle Nebraska, Garden. In southwest Nebraska, Keith. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas has been reported. The minor flooding is occurring in fields near the river, where it typically occurs. No roads have been impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 737 AM MST, Local law enforcement reported an ice jam near the advisory area. Minor low-land flooding is ongoing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewellen, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Ruthon and Eagle Gulch Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
